info.name: Oracle Fusion Cloud COMMON - Manage Tasks
info.description:
REST API collection for Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Common â€” Manage Tasks module.

Created by [Adrian Anderson](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aanderson1017/) | [YouTube - Better Human Applications](https://www.youtube.com/@BetterHumanApplications)

item.name: Manage Tasks

query.description: Task status - ASSIGNED (default), SUSPENDED, WITHDRAWN, EXPIRED, ERROR, ALERTED
Task priority from 1 (highest) to 5 (lowest) or Any (default)
Previous task assignee
Start of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
End of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
Task assignees - MY, GROUP,  MY_AND_GROUP (default), MY_AND_GROUP_ALL, REPORTEES, OWNER, REVIEWER, PREVIOUS, ALL, ADMIN
Keyword in task title
Maximum number of items per page, between 1 and 100, default 25
Index for the first item on a page of list items, default 1
Groups tasks by the selected task attribute
Includes only to-do tasks if set to ToDo
Action
Permission - true or false
Metadata - true or false(default)
Total Result - true (default) or false
Returned items must be created later than the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
Returned items must be created before the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z

request.description: Retrieves a custom task list by name.

request.description: Retrieves a list of custom task lists (views) that the current user has defined.

item.name: Retrieve a Task Attachment as a Stream

request.description:
Retrieves an attachment by name as a stream.
If Oracle Content and Experience (documents) is enabled for this task, attachments do not apply.

response.name: Displays the file contents. Response type will be based on the mime type of the attachment.
No inputstream exists for attachment with given name

variable.description: (Required) Name of attachment to be deleted

request.description:
Deletes an attachment by name.
If Oracle Content and Experience (documents) is enabled for this task, attachments do not apply.

variable.description: (Required) Name of attachment to be deleted
(Required) Name of attachment to be deleted
(Required) Name of attachment to be deleted
(Required) Name of attachment to be deleted
(Required) Name of attachment to be deleted

item.name: Retrieve a Task Attachment by Name

request.description:
Retrieves an attachment by name.
If Oracle Content and Experience (documents) is enabled for this task, attachments do not apply.

response.name: Attachment with given name not found

request.description:
Adds an attachment to a task.
If Oracle Content and Experience (documents) is enabled for this task, attachments do not apply.

Retrieves task attachments.
If Oracle Content and Experience (documents) is enabled for this task, attachments do not apply.
Adds a comment to a task.

request.description: Retrieves the history of a task.

request.description: Retrieves the payload of a task.
Updates the payload of a task.

Performs the action on a specific task identifier, based on the payload. The following actions are available and the actions depend on the application: APPROVE, REJECT, REASSIGN, DELEGATE, WITHDRAW, SUSPEND, RESUME, DELETE, PURGE, ACQUIRE, RELEASE, PUSHBACK, ERROR, ADHOC_ROUTE, INFO_REQUEST, INFO_SUBMIT, SKIP_CURRENT_ASSIGNMENT, SAVE and ESCALATE. Custom Actions depend on the task definition.

response.name: Success . In case of PURGE, a title specifying task id successfully purged will be returned.
The tasknumber is invalid.No action will be performed.

variable.description: (Required) Task ID (Internally known as the task number)

query.description: Value of all fields that are to be expanded (detailed) - All, comments, attachments, history, payload. If not specified Links to each of the fields is returned.
Metadata - true or false

request.description: Retrieves a task by task ID (The task number).

variable.description: (Required) Task ID (Internally known as the task number)

query.description: Value of all fields that are to be expanded (detailed) - All, comments, attachments, history, payload. If not specified Links to each of the fields is returned.
Metadata - true or false

variable.description: (Required) Task ID (Internally known as the task number)

query.description: Value of all fields that are to be expanded (detailed) - All, comments, attachments, history, payload. If not specified Links to each of the fields is returned.

query.description: Value of all fields that are to be expanded (detailed) - All, comments, attachments, history, payload. If not specified Links to each of the fields is returned.
Metadata - true or false

Metadata - true or false

variable.description: (Required) Task ID (Internally known as the task number)

query.description: Value of all fields that are to be expanded (detailed) - All, comments, attachments, history, payload. If not specified Links to each of the fields is returned.
Metadata - true or false

request.description: Performs the action on multiple tasks based on the payload. The following actions are available and the actions depend on the application: APPROVE, REJECT, REASSIGN, DELEGATE, WITHDRAW, SUSPEND, RESUME, DELETE, PURGE and ESCALATE. Custom Actions depend on the task definition.

query.description:
Task status
(Task status COMPLETED is valid when used with following assignments - ADMIN, ALL, PREVIOUS)
Task priority from 1 (highest) to 5 (lowest) or Any (default)
Start of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
End of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z

Task assignees - MY, GROUP, MY_AND_GROUP (default), MY_AND_GROUP_ALL, REPORTEES, OWNER, REVIEWER, PREVIOUS, ALL, ADMIN.

MY - Displays tasks that are assigned exclusively to you. 
GROUP - Displays tasks that are assigned to a group of which you are a member. 
MY_AND_GROUP -Displays tasks that are assigned to anyone, including you, in the groups you belongs to.This will not fetch tasks that are acquired by some other user in the groups you belong to.
MY_AND_GROUP_ALL -Displays tasks that are assigned to anyone, including you, in the groups you belongs to.This will even fetch tasks that are acquired by some other user in the groups you belong to.
REPORTEES - Displays tasks that are assigned to reportees of you
OWNER - Displays tasks in which you are task owner.
REVIEWER -Displays tasks for which you are a reviewer
PREVIOUS - Displays tasks that were previously updated by you
ALL - No filtering; Displays all tasks regardless of assignment or creator. 
ADMIN -  No filtering; Displays all tasks regardless of assignment or creator.
Keyword in task title
Previous task assignee
Maximum number of items per page, preferably between 1 and 100, default 25. Zero or negative value will render the parameter inapplicable and all results will be returned in single page
Index for the first item on a page of list items. Negative value will render the parameter inapplicable

Field with which results are to be ordered.  Given as orderBy=fieldname:asc/desc, default is asc for ascending.Field Names supported are createdDate, creator, updatedDate, fromUser, tasknumber,  priority,ownerUser, state, approvalDuration,taskDefinitionName, taskNameSpace, taskId, category,assignedDate, dueDate,outcome,ecid, identificationKey

Displays only the selected task attributes, which can include createdDate, creator, updatedDate, fromUser, tasknumber,  priority,ownerUser, state, approvalDuration,taskDefinitionName, taskNameSpace, taskId, category,assignedDate, dueDate,outcome,ecid, identificationKey
If pattern value is set to 'ToDo' then only ToDo tasks are returned.
Show Action - true or false
Show Permission - true or false
metadataFlag - true or false. if metadataFlag is true, then task details URL is populated.
Total Result - true or false
Returned items must be created later than the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
Returned items must be created before the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
if provided, only tasks with the given task identification key are returned
if provided, only tasks with the given task outcome value are returned
if provided, only tasks created by the given user are returned

request.description: Retrieves a task list for the current user.

Returned items must be created later than the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
Returned items must be created before the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
if provided, only tasks with the given task identification key are returned
if provided, only tasks with the given task outcome value are returned
if provided, only tasks created by the given user are returned

Task status
(Task status COMPLETED is valid when used with following assignments - ADMIN, ALL, PREVIOUS)
Task priority from 1 (highest) to 5 (lowest) or Any (default)
Start of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
End of due date range in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z

Task assignees - MY, GROUP, MY_AND_GROUP (default), MY_AND_GROUP_ALL, REPORTEES, OWNER, REVIEWER, PREVIOUS, ALL, ADMIN.

MY - Displays tasks that are assigned exclusively to you. 
GROUP - Displays tasks that are assigned to a group of which you are a member. 
MY_AND_GROUP -Displays tasks that are assigned to anyone, including you, in the groups you belongs to.This will not fetch tasks that are acquired by some other user in the groups you belong to.
MY_AND_GROUP_ALL -Displays tasks that are assigned to anyone, including you, in the groups you belongs to.This will even fetch tasks that are acquired by some other user in the groups you belong to.
REPORTEES - Displays tasks that are assigned to reportees of you
OWNER - Displays tasks in which you are task owner.
REVIEWER -Displays tasks for which you are a reviewer
PREVIOUS - Displays tasks that were previously updated by you
ALL - No filtering; Displays all tasks regardless of assignment or creator. 
ADMIN -  No filtering; Displays all tasks regardless of assignment or creator.
Keyword in task title
Previous task assignee
Maximum number of items per page, preferably between 1 and 100, default 25. Zero or negative value will render the parameter inapplicable and all results will be returned in single page
Index for the first item on a page of list items. Negative value will render the parameter inapplicable

Field with which results are to be ordered.  Given as orderBy=fieldname:asc/desc, default is asc for ascending.Field Names supported are createdDate, creator, updatedDate, fromUser, tasknumber,  priority,ownerUser, state, approvalDuration,taskDefinitionName, taskNameSpace, taskId, category,assignedDate, dueDate,outcome,ecid, identificationKey

Displays only the selected task attributes, which can include createdDate, creator, updatedDate, fromUser, tasknumber,  priority,ownerUser, state, approvalDuration,taskDefinitionName, taskNameSpace, taskId, category,assignedDate, dueDate,outcome,ecid, identificationKey
If pattern value is set to 'ToDo' then only ToDo tasks are returned.
Show Action - true or false
Show Permission - true or false
metadataFlag - true or false. if metadataFlag is true, then task details URL is populated.
Total Result - true or false
Returned items must be created later than the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
Returned items must be created before the specified time, in ISO-8601 format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS[.sss]Z
if provided, only tasks with the given task identification key are returned
if provided, only tasks with the given task outcome value are returned
if provided, only tasks created by the given user are returned

item.description: Retrieve task lists. Retrieve, create, update, and delete tasks.
